home.title: Welcome
home.description: Explore the world of my ideas, projects and inspiration on the homepage of my business card site and blog.

about.title: Find out about me
about.description: Open the 'About Me' page to learn more about my creative journey, hobbies and goals. Welcome to my virtual world!

contacts.title: Contact me
contacts.description: On the contact page you will find everything you need to contact me. Share your questions, suggestions or just write hello!

portfolio.title: My portfolio
portfolio.description: An overview of my best projects, ideas and achievements. Immerse yourself in the world of my work presented in the portfolio on this page.
